biography_text: KUSTOFF, David, a Representative from Tennessee; born in Memphis, Tenn., October 8, 1966; graduated from White Station High School, Memphis, Shelby County, Tenn., 1985; B.B.A., University of Memphis, Memphis, Tenn., 1989; J.D., University of Memphis, Memphis, Tenn., 1992; lawyer, private practice; United States Attorney for the Western District of Tennessee, 2006-2008; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Eighth Congress in 2002; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
